## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] I have added/updated theory documentation for ML features

### Backend Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if schema changes)
- [ ] API documentation is updated (if API changes)
- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed in logs or responses
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate and informative

### Frontend Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] UI changes are responsive
- [ ] Accessibility standards are met
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Browser compatibility tested

### ML Engine Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] Model performance is validated
- [ ] Training/prediction examples are provided
- [ ] Theory documentation is included/updated
- [ ] Unit tests cover edge cases

### CI/CD
- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] Docker builds successfully
- [ ] No merge conflicts
